name: CommodityAI
long_description:
CommodityAI builds intelligent automation agents for the most operationally complex businesses in the world: physical commodity traders.

In these environments, critical data is buried in spreadsheets, emails, PDFs, and legacy systems. This makes operations slow, error prone, and heavily reliant on manual work. CommodityAI acts as a digital operator, constantly monitoring and interpreting this unstructured information to keep records accurate and systems up to date.

Our agents read and validate key details from trade confirmations, contracts, shipping updates, and more. They transform scattered data into clean, structured records that flow directly into CTRMs, ERPs, and other internal tools without requiring human input.

At the core is the CommodityAI Platform, a flexible foundation for building and managing agents that integrate with business systems and scale alongside operations.
